mapper.insert: insert into product_db(p_category, p_name, p_price, p_count, p_img, p_img2, p_content) values(#{p_category},#{p_name},#{p_price},#{p_count},#{p_img},#{p_img2},#{p_content})
mapper.update: update product_db set p_category=#{p_category}, p_name=#{p_name}, p_price=#{p_price}, p_count=#{p_count}, p_img=#{p_img}, p_img2=#{p_img2}, p_content=#{p_content} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select *from product_db where p_category = #{p_category} and seq > 0 order by seq desc limit #{vo.pageStart}, #{vo.perPageNum}
select count(seq) from product_db where p_category = #{p_category} and seq > 0
mapper.update: update product_db set p_hit = p_hit + 1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select c.seq, p.seq as p_seq, p.p_name, p.p_img, p.p_price, c.cdate, c.count from cart_db as c, product_db as p where c.u_seq = 1 and c.p_seq=p.seq;
mapper.update: update cart_db set count=#{count} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select *from product_db order by p_hit desc limit 0,4;
select *from product_db order by seq desc limit 0,4;
